participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and outgoing, enjoys engaging in conversations and making new friends.
participant_1.background: i also have a dog walking business. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. my father was a door to door salesman.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and approachable, balancing work and studies with a positive outlook on life.
participant_2.background: i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i do not like chicken. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend.

content.text: Do you want to talk with me?
I want to tell you that i don't like chicken
